author: Special Correspondent
text:
Five fishermen of R. Pudhupattinam near here who ventured into sea in two country boats on Wednesday were injured when a group of fishermen from mechanised boats attacked them in the mid-sea. The mechanised boat fishermen had come from Kottaipattinam, the police said.

The incident is considered a sequel to the for by the country boat fishermen at Manamelkudi on March 2, demanding a ban on illegal use of pair trawling and purse seine nets by mechanised boat fishermen. A group of mechanised boat fishermen hit the country boats. The fishermen damaged the nets and attacked the country boat fishermen before fleeing the area.

The injured — Nagooran, Pazhanivel, Nagendran, Venkatraman and Kalidas — were rescued by the Coastal Police personnel and brought to Manamelkudi GH.
title: Five injured in mid-sea clash of fishermen
